Theodore:
We were all bit excited to see the tomb of a Giant king, you know. And we rushed in there without investigating. No thought for safety. But the guy had been dead for ages.
Looking back, we were far too reckless. In moments, we were attacked by the Ancient Ghosts guarding the place. We lost many and were forced to retreat without making any progress...
But we can't give up! Otherwise all our comrades will have died for nothing. Can you help us? You are strong enough to defeat Harnak's Wraith...
